{{cpp/container/mdspan/extents/title|''dynamic-index''}}
{{cpp/container/mdspan/extents/navbar}}
{{ddcl|since=c++23|notes={{mark expos}}|
private:
    static constexpr auto /*dynamic-index*/( rank_type i ) noexcept;
}}

Returns the number of dynamic extents below index {{c|i}}. If {{c|1=i &lt;= rank()}} is {{c/core|false}}, the behavior is undefined.

===Parameters===
{{par begin}}
{{par|i|the index}}
{{par end}}

===Return value===
The number of {{tti|E{{sub|r}}}} with {{tt|r &lt; i}} for which {{tti|E{{sub|r}}}} is a dynamic extent.
